content.p: As an international student, you can access the full range of services and resources from us plus we have additional resources specific to you. Find advice on securing a job in the UK after you graduate Find out about the work experience opportunities at Nottingham Get support during every stage of the job application process Discover what UK employers look for in candidates We can help you make the most of your time at Nottingham and plan your next steps Advice about finding the right course and visas if further study is your goal Start here for advice and access to GoinGlobal and resources covering five continents To international students aiming to make a mark in the UK job market, my advice is to stay persistent and proactive. Para Saraiya, graduate Read Para's career story telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
